name: v4.3.3
body:
* Tweaked GitHub provider support
* Fixed issue with the compact mode
* Switched to Python 3.11

name: v4.3.2
body: * Updated support of ElvUI development version

name: v4.3.1
body: * Minor tweaks and bugfixes

name: v4.3.0
body: * Implemented Wrath of the Lich King Classic support

name: v4.2.1
body: * Minor tweaks and bugfixes

name: v4.2.0
body:
* Improved speed of Wago Addons support
* Improved `install` command auto-completion
* Tweaked handling of Source column in TUI

name: v4.1.0
body: * Added preliminary support for Wrath of the Lich King Classic client

name: v4.0.1
body: * Minor tweaks and bugfixes

name: v4.0.0
body:
* Added beta support for Wago Addons
* Removed Curseforge and Townlong Yak support
* Improved GitHub support
* Migrated to separate companion addon to better support Weakauras

* Added support for GitHub API token
* Minor tweaks and bugfixes

* Added TBC support
* Improved Wago support
* Minor tweaks and bugfixes

body:
* Added command to execute manual backup
* Added support for dev version of Tukui
* Allowed to ignore the dependencies during addon installation
* Bugfixes and tweaks

name: v3.15.4
body: * Improved error handling

name: v3.15.3
body: * Applied temporary fix for issues with Tukui source

name: v3.15.2
body: * New Windows binary that hopefully will not irritate Windows Defender that much :-)

body: * Minor bugfixes and tweaks

name: v3.15.0
body:
* Added support for new CurseForge URI
* Entering interactive mode is now triggering the backup check

body: * Minor bugfixes

* Minor bugfixes

name: v3.13.0
body:
* Version column now displays a warning when the project doesn't have a release for the current WoW version
* Added `show dependencies` command
* Minor bugfixes

name: v3.12.1
body: * Minor bugfixes

name: v3.12.0
body:
* Some of the options were renamed/reorganized
* Version column now also display information about used release channel
* Name column now optionally (enabled by default) display name of addon author
* Improved accuracy of `import` command
* Some changes to support Shadowlands/pre-patch better
* Minor bugfixes

name: v3.11.1
body: * Implemented an addon blocklist

name: v3.11.0
body:
* Improved accuracy of `import` command
* Dependencies of addons are now parsed
* Added simple `recommendation` system

name: v3.10.2
body: * Minor bugfixes

name: v3.10.1
body: * Not so minor bugfix

name: v3.10.0
body:
* Interface now display links to projects and changelogs if used terminal emulator supports hyperlinks
* Added option to disable addon autoupdate on startup
* `force_update` command now supports the bulk operations
* Minor bugfixes
